resources.string: This is a Widget to display the latest 3 Hourly Planetary(estimated Ap) K Indices from http://www.swpc.noaa.gov/ftpdir/lists/geomag/AK.txt to e.g. help UAS Pilots to be aware of possible GPS-Problems.\nIf you do not know what a widget is you might have a look at this Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZMsqSQzV6nw \nThanks to http://mikrokopter.de for the impulse, http://www.swpc.noaa.gov for the Data and Clemens -Nebukad- Wronski for the Graphics!
